overview: In Cajazeiras, in the hinterlands of Paraíba, singer Núbia Galvão (her stage name, after singer Núbia Lafayette) talks about the difficulties she faced when she tried her professional career. In 1973, she went to the Chacrinha show, in Rio de Janeiro, but got frustrated for not being successful. She travels around her town selling perfumes, giving guitar lessons, and still sings serenades.
title: Sonho Destrela
